itinerary.title: Travelling to Quito
points: Meet Tour Director & Check Into Hotel
itinerary.description: Flight delays, gate changes, anticipation: day 1 was a day of travel. With the recent eruption of Volcan Wolf, I was extra excited to see what the Galapagos Islands would hold.

itinerary.title: Quito Landmarks
itinerary.description: It was such a relief to finally arrive in the capital city of Ecuador. The day was spent exploring the city's sites: Inta√±an Museum, markets, San Francisco church, and more.

itinerary.title: Quito - Galapagos
points: Meet Tour Director & Check Into Hotel
itinerary.description: For my birthday, I got travel to the Galapagos Islands for the first time! The day started early in the morning with a flight to Guayapil and then Baltra. A speedboat then took the group to San Cristobal, where we would be staying.

itinerary.title: San Cristobal
itinerary.description: Progresso Tower, Cerro Colorado Breeding Station, El Junco, snorkeling
